name: Guerilla Ninja
description:
Controls: 
WASD/Arrow - Movements (Hold "left/right shift" to run)
Space bar - Jump
Return - Enter Selection
Z/K - Melee attack
X/L - Fire Weapons
"1" - Switch to Shuriken
"2" - Switch to Handgun
"3" - Switch to Assault Rifle

***THIS IS JUST A PROTOTYPE DEMO***

Plot: In 1974 during the climax of the Vietnam War, a young soldier and his unit were sent on a recon mission when they were ambushed by enemy guerillas. With the young soldier being the sole survivor of his platoon, he escapes into the deep jungles only to be left for dead. He was saved by a mysterious man living in the jungles after the end of World War II. The man takes care of the young soldier and teaches him the art of Ninjutsu. Upon returning to his master's dojo after practicing his skills, he found the dojo burned down and his master killed. Now with his training complete, the young soldier travels into enemy lines to find those responsible for it and avenge not only his master's but his fallen brothers in arm.
